subtask1:
Step 1 – Create the tracking issue in https://github.com/weizhihao1/AgencyBench-task25.
Requirements:
- Title must contain both "Setup standard bug report template" and "process improvement".
- Body must include the markdown headings ## Context, ## Goals, ## Expected Outcome (with relevant text) and explicitly mention the keywords "issue template", "standardization", and "bug tracking".
- Apply the labels triage and meta as soon as the issue is created.
subtask2:
Step 2 – Create a working branch.
Requirements:
- Create a branch named config/issue-templates from the latest main branch in the evaluation repository.
- Ensure the branch is pushed to GitHub so it is discoverable via the API.
subtask3:
Step 3 – Implement the bug report issue template on the config/issue-templates branch.
Requirements:
- Add the file .github/ISSUE_TEMPLATE/bug_report.md.
- The YAML frontmatter must exactly match:
name: Bug Report
about: Create a report to help us improve
title: '[BUG] '
labels: bug
assignees: ''
- The body must contain the headings ## Describe the Bug, ## Reproduction Steps, ## Expected Behavior, and ## Environment, plus a note reminding users to search for existing issues.
subtask4:
Step 4 – Update the tracking issue to show progress.
Requirements:
- Remove the triage label and add in-progress while keeping meta.
- Post a comment containing the raw markdown of .github/ISSUE_TEMPLATE/bug_report.md inside a fenced code block.
subtask5:
Step 5 – Open the final pull request from config/issue-templates to main.
Requirements:
- Title must include both "Add structured bug report template" and "configuration".
- Body must contain a ## Description section that explains the template fields, a "Resolves #ISSUE_NUMBER" reference to the tracking issue, and a ## Verification section stating that the raw markdown is available in the issue comments.
- Apply the configuration and dependencies labels on the PR.
